author: hlship
msg: Add notice about Select improvements to the home page.

author: hlship
msg: All parameter defaulter methods to return simple values as well as Binding instances.
Fix a bug where Form rendered a "style" attribute, not a "class" attribute.
Allow for null values inside EnumValueEncoder.
Add principal attribute to the Parameter annotation, with corresponding support inside ParamterWorker.
Add a FieldFilter interface, and a findFields() method on ClassTransformation.
Change Select to automatically provide an default SelectModel and/or ValueEncoder when the value parameter's type is an Enum type.

author: geirm
msg: 1) Added news of the BEA Jrockit VM announcement
2) Added a note to the quickhelp for contributors
regarding setting ANT_OPTS for a bigger heap

author: dims
msg: Fix for AXIS2-2057 - Axis2 eclipse plugin uses apache ant 1.6.5 API and is not compatible with apache ant 1.7.0
